source:
%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "synapsesazerog"
blob_container_name = "raw"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("AzureBlobStorage2")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://raw@synapsesazerog.blob.core.windows.net/stage/pax 03 2019.txt', format='text')
display(df.limit(10))
